title: Game developement
author: game
description:
If I'm on the ground and I press up I should go up, 
If I'm not on the ground and I press up I should go down
But if I'm on the ground and I don't press up, I should keep going down
 And if I don't press anything, I'll be going down because of gravity

Variable A is me being on the ground,
Variable B is me pressing the up button,
Output C is me going up,
Output D is me going down
